title: Google Chrome tests warning for closing all tabs on Android
content:
Google Chrome is still the most popular browser on Android devices, mostly because it’s the default option on most phones. New features are tested on a frequent basis, usually first showing up in the ‘Canary’ unstable release channel, and another one has just appeared that might save people from accidentally losing tabs. Chrome on Android

The post Google Chrome tests warning for closing all tabs on Android appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is now testing a confirmation prompt for closing tabs when using Chrome on Android. Read on to learn more.
